column4: hey guys im trying to run ubuntu on vpc 7 but i can't get it to work anyone done this before
any body ran ubuntu on a virtual pc
a few times
im doing it on a mac and i have ubuntu 8.10 on a dvd and when i select install ubuntu from the menu it runs all this stuff and then just stops
when does it stop?
it doens't actually ever get into the splash screen
try disabling acpi and dma on the first boot
how do i do that
are you running the desktop or alternative cd?
desktop
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BootOptions
that didn't fix it
it says abunch of garbage about like ?text_poke_early+0x52/0x70 etc..
you need to edit the boot option for the kernel with Press the F6 key to select Other Options. Then add noacpi dma=no
its all there
k
i pasted that from the site i gave you but anyway...
yeah well i can't press f4 im on a mac
of course you can , the keyboard is captured
it won't let me it keeps bringing up the dashboard
if its a virtual system you boot to the host OS
for some reason its not capturing my keyboard on those keys
